title: No CEO? No problem.
description: Decisions might come more slowly, but consensus building creates a stronger company, says Jack Petersen of Summit Trail Advisors.
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
itunes:summary: Decisions might come more slowly, but consensus building creates a stronger company, says Jack Petersen of Summit Trail Advisors.
